tool_description: Fast and Reliable Job Salary/Pay Estimations from all major publishers - LinkedIn, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter, and many others, all in a single API.
name: Job Salary Data
title: Job Salary Data

api_list.name: Job Salary
api_list.description: Get estimated job salaries/pay by job title and location.

required_parameters.name: job_title
required_parameters.description: Job title for which to get salary estimation

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Free-text location/area in which to get salary estimation

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Search radius in km (measured from *location*).
Default: `200`.
